reviews.review:
Oyunun hikayesi güzel olmakla birlikte beyni cidden çok zorlatan oyun 19 Nisan 2011 tarihinde yapılmıştır.Bence yıla göre çok güzel bir kalitesi var.
Ve size 2 tane OYUNDA önemli yere sahip olan cümleyi söylicem

GlaDos:Oh...Bu sensin.Çok uzun süre oldu,görüşmeyeli nasılsın?Ölmüş olmakla çok meşguldüm.Bilirsin sen BENİ ÖLDÜRDÜKTEN SONRA hani..
GlaDOS wake up

Wheatley:Keşke hepsini geri getirebilseydim (uzayda).Gerçekten.Gerçekten herşeyi geri getirebilseydim.Bunları sadece uzayda sıkışıp kaldığım için söylemiyorum.Neyse,Onu yeniden görebilseydim ne derdim biliyor musunuz?Özür dilerim hem de kalpten canavar gibiydim son
很好，要动点脑子，休闲时玩玩
this game is nice. good story, humor, puzzles and characters. i dont like that some puzzles are too hard to solve that's why i co op and have youtube open.

One of the best games of all time. Fantastic spatial reasoning puzzles (and the co-op puzzles are even better and harder with 4 portals to work with), sharp and witty writing, and some of the best voice performances in all of gaming from Ellen McLain, Stephen Merchant, and J.K. Simmons. It also regularly goes on sale with ridiculously steep discounts, so you have no excuse to not own this game.

The original atmosphere, many portals and...  turrets. You will pass many tests for your savvy and thinking, which will be accompanied by light humor, easter eggs and unexpected twists. There is no game similar to Portal 2, which I have ever played yet (except for Portal :)).

I'm pretty sure that there's no glowing review that I could give that would further bolster its reputation.  But it deserves every bit of it.  This deserves to be a part of everyone's library.

10/10

GOODTHINGs:
1-story is great as fuck and easy to know every thing happen (if your language is shit you can understanding that story).
2-great experience with co-op mode if you have friends you have to tell him about this game.
3-Nice voice acting (i mean "GLaDOS")
4-its easy to create map.
5-Nice design on menu.
***NOTE***:Do not play this game if you didn't play portal 1, there is alot thing you will never understand. (i played portal 1 with crack :'( ).

BADTHINGs:
1-if you don't have friends do not buy this ( i mean if you are alone you can add me :") ).
2-id think there is any thing bad on thing game :\.

不得不说，传送门系列真的是双人合作游戏的灵魂作品，单机内容十分丰富，并且官方的双人合作地图就足够你玩上很久很久，再加上创意工坊上的各种玩家自制的地图，可以说这个游戏真的是能够“半永久”玩下去的。

Just finished this game today and found it very enjoyable and fun!
the puzzles always kept me thinking, and I was very entertained by each one.
The story is also amazing! It has very well developed charcters and the plot was just so good.
I also got this on sale for two dollars, but I would DEFINITLEY buy this at full price.
The game ran so smooth and my computer or better yet laptop is craappy and this game was full of so many obatacls and the graphics were splendid so i was very suprised! 
Definitley would recond thiis to ANYONE, even if puzzles aren't your thing give it a try you will not regret this purchase!

Öncelikle vericeğiniz paryaı sonuna kadar hakeden nadir oyunlardan 2 arkadas oturup 5-6 saat kesintisiz oynatıcak bir oyun bazen cidden beyin yakan map ler oluyor ama bu da oyuna zevk katan seylerden o verdigniz çaba o verdigniz takım calısması cidden zevk veriyor ve oyuna baglıyor insanı almanızı cidden tavsiye ederim.
I LOVE YOU GLADOS I LOVE YOU!!
Muito bom, o final é sensacional. Os puzzles continuam legais, como o primeiro, com certos itens a mais, que deixam ainda mais divertido. Espero que venha mais um pra essa saga!
Absolutely amazing game. It is hilarious when it needs to be and challenging. One of the best games ever that combines worthwhile gameplay, replayability, and quality comedic writing. 10/10
This game is great. Great storyline and dialogue, challenging tests and puzzles, great co op/ multiplayer. I would highly recommend this game to anyone.

Um jogo extremamente genial ! A história vai te surpreender e fazer com que você se empolgue ao jogar (recomendo que tenha jogado o Portal 1 para entender melhor a história), as novas mecânicas adicionadas ao portal 2 foram muito bem pensadas o que acaba por deixar o jogo com puzzles mais elaborados e mais desafiadores, recomendo este jogo para pessoas que tenham o interesse em jogos de puzzles (O que exige uma certa paciência). Outro ponto positivo são os mapas feitos por outros jogadores, e o modo de jogo cooperativo, o que não deixa o jogo ficar sem graça com o tempo.
10/10 would send my friends into a pit of acid again.

This game is amazing. Fun especially in co-op mode. However during the last stages of co-op mode my brain was barely handling all of it, hopefully two brains could handle it. 
GLaDOS is one of the best things could ever happen. GLaDOS was/is very amusing and totally recommend an interaction with her.

Dope game with dope brain exploding puzzles.

This game will make you dream in puzzles, portals and speak robot. This game challenges the mind with fun and tricky levels in the compelling single player story mode as well as a fun Online & Offline Co-op mode that will have you and your friend head scratchin'. You will encounter portal placin', laser beamin', platforms a movin', puzzle creation (level editor), hard light bridges, machines a shootin', weird liquids a sprayin', and uh, oh yeah... hours of fun. If you haven't picked up this classic I reccomend getting it (the first game as well). Solid 9.5/10 from me.
Great game to play with your friend, unless he kills you all the time..
thanks for every single one who is making this game greater and better .
This game was just as amazing as the last, just better. With the better graphics and (engine?) it gave a whole new feel to the game.
Still pleasant to launch from time to time and just flow through the game or the community made maps.
Tem Que Usar Muito A Cabeça Oque Eu Não Tenho
游戏很简单

La historia es muy buena, me encanta el progreso sorprendente [spoiler] Y el "detalle especial" de Weathley [/spoiler] en la trama, los puzzles son desafiantes, y el modo cooperativo es lo mejor; lo jugue con un amigo por horas intentando resolver los puzzles. Lo recomiendo.

I would just like to say this game is great! the story is awsome and anyone that likes puzzles and time off stressful shooter games this is for you. I have played hours and hours of co-op with my freinds and it is great. The co-op is fun for playing localy and online for a challange with buddies. The story mode has a great plot twist and it is very exiting to play and i have enjoyed it a lot. For the steam summer sale i got it for $1.99 witch is a steal on this great game! i would even reccomend the game at $20 beacuse the sory is hours of fun and you can play it mulitple times without getting bored beacuse of the fun puzzles. When you play this game and complete a hard level you get a sence of accomplishment that feels great! you feel like you didi the right think and you feel like you are getting the gang of the game. I would reccomend 10/10
Buena jugabilidad,entretenido
